title: Panzanella putanesca
directions: Preheat the oven to 175 Â° C. Cut the bread into cubes, spread on a lined baking tray and bake for about 15 min. In the middle of the oven. Take out of the oven. Meanwhile, halve the onion and cut into thin slices. Put in a bowl, pour boiling water over and let drain in a colander.

Halve the tomatoes and remove the seeds with a teaspoon, collect the juice in a bowl. Whisk the juice with the vinegar and oil to make dressing and season with pepper and salt. Cut the tomatoes into quarters and the peppers into strips.

Mix with the bread, onion and capers and pour over the dressing. Shovel and let stand at least 15 min., So that the flavors can withdraw good. Meanwhile, cut the anchovy fillets coarse. Mix the basil by the panzanella. Garnish with anchovies and olives.
